# NormalizationScaler.NormalizationStrategy.l1

**Case**

A normalization strategy that scales by the L1 Norm (sum of vector absolute values).

## Declaration

```swift
case l1
```

## Normalization strategies

- **NormalizationScaler.NormalizationStrategy.l2**: A normalization strategy that scales by the L2 Norm (Euclidean norm).

items.description: A normalization strategy that scales by the L2 Norm (Euclidean norm).
